participant_abstract.sent: The meeting was a summary of the information aquired by each member of the team with regard to the specific design requirements of the remote.
We have discovered that the company does not want us to design a unviersal remote but rather a remote specifically for TV.
This changes the initial design requirements.
We have since discussed the various functions of the remote and how we would like it to look.
Our target audience was also discussed and we have decided on a universal quality.
The design is to be kept simple and include the company logo.

participant_actions.sent: I need to investigate the main components of the remote and present my findings at the next meeting.

participant_decisions.sent: Little to no techical ability required.
On/Off, volume up/down, channel up/down, mute, etc. - Logo will be small and at the bottom of the remote.
An ability to be found by the user when lost.
Potential for a base instead of simple battery power.
Menu option for more complex functions like closed captioning, subtitles, etc. - voice activation functions.

participant_problems.sent: We have not decided on our power source.
I think that a base would be a good idea for voice activation functions etc. - the company colour isn't exactly great so we cannot make the whole of the remote that colour.
Prices for materials to create this??
